mapper.select: select emp_no, dept_name, position_name, board_grant_name, site_grant_name , emp_name, emp_pwd, corp_phone, postcode, address, detail_address, extra_address, mobile, email, firstday, photo_route, photo_name, status from tbl_employee E left join tbl_dept_name D on E.fk_dept_no = D.dept_no left join tbl_position_sort P on E.fk_position_no = P.position_no left join tbl_board_grant B on E.fk_board_grant_no = B.board_grant_no left join tbl_site_grant S on E.fk_site_grant_no = S.site_grant_no where emp_no = #{emp_no} and emp_pwd = #{emp_pwd}
mapper.update: update tbl_employee set emp_pwd = #{certPassword} where emp_no = #{emp_no}
